title: Joan Sutherland: who's afraid of opera: "The Barber of Seville"
creator_credit: Ted Kotcheff, Nathan Kroll, Kroll Productions and Phoenix Films
brief_description: Joan Sutherland explains the story of the opera “The Barber of Seville” to an audience of three hand puppets. Together with other singers, she performs excerpts from the work. This film is suitable for all ages. Musical direction by Richard Bonygne and performed by the London Symphony Orchestra.
